content.description: A committing start leads to endless crimp buckets and solid feet.  Work your way to the top, keeping an eye out for loose/brittle rock.  Several non-essential holds are bound to break off if this route starts to see more traffic.  Excellent warm up route that really works the fingers.
content.protection: 3 bolts plus a 2 bolt anchor with chains
content.location: Route is about 15 feet to the left of the large flake that marks the start of Gay Mafia

content.description: Start up the wall just left of the dihedral on easier moves which give way to thin holds and a difficult reach up to the chains.
content.protection: 4 bolts plus 2 bolt anchor with chains
content.location: Cross the creek from the Bleeder wall and head straight back to the West cliffline.  You will see an obvious dihedral that turns into a right leaning ramp.  The route climbs just left of the dihedral.

content.description: Somewhat forgotten wall with a handful of routes that see little traffic.
